Description:
Position Title:               Customer Service ExecutiveEmployment Type:     Full Time  Salary:                        up to 7K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications Job Location:                Dubai, UAE  About the Client:  A well-established logistics expert company based in Dubai, offering comprehensive all-in-one solutions. Job Description:  Ensure consistent, excellent customer service and satisfaction to freight forwarding field.
Accurately complete carriers and submission of shipping instructions.
Build strong customer relationships, understand and monitor customer’s processes and KPIs, and provide daily/weekly/monthly reports.
Perform shipping documentation and coordination with shipping line or agent as well as transportation with overseas offices.
Comply to company's SOP and quality policy, and perform other tasks as assigned by the superior.Skills
Skills:
Open to Indian nationals
Female, 40 years old and below
Bachelor’s degree or any relevant certificate
At least 2 years of experience from freight forwarding company, of which 1 year must be in the UAE
Must have full knowledge for both air & sea pricing
Candidates who can join immediately will be prioritized
